short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say Goodbye to Manual Calendar Entry! 📅

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension lets you export your UW courses from your registration page directly into Google or Apple Calendar. Just click a button for each class, and enjoy automated events with details like location, days, times, and repeat schedules.

🔑 Key Features:
- Per-Class Export: Select individual classes to add to your calendar with ease. 📅
- Automatic Details: The extension fills in course name, professor, location, and schedule, recurring until the quarter's end.
- Google & Apple Calendar Ready: Export to Google Calendar instantly or download an ICS file for Apple Calendar.
- User-Friendly: Works seamlessly on the UW registration page – designed with students in mind.

🛠️ How to Use:
- Install from the Chrome Web Store and pin for quick access.
- Click the button next to each class on your registration page to export.
- Save the Google Calendar event or open the ICS file to add it to Apple Calendar.

🔒 Privacy First: 
We don’t store or share any personal data – everything stays local to your browser.

Simplify your scheduling with UW Calendar Exporter and stay organized!
